text:
When processing a PUT, the information present in the HTTP content-type header
is thrown away. Instead, the server should persist both type and optionally the
encoding, and return it in GET, HEAD and PROPFIND requests.
creator: julian.reschke@gmx.de

text:
Note that mod_dav has a bit of this capability. See DAV_DISABLE_WRITABLE_PROPS
in dav/main/props.c.

Hard problem. Systems like mod_dav_svn could do this much better, so mod_dav
needs to learn a way to allow providers to control the set/get of the content type.
creator: gstein@gmail.com
